actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for first amendment protection of the free press.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: First Amendment Protection Act - States that no journalist or news medium shall be required by any judicial, executive, legislative, or administrative body of the United States or of any Commonwealth, territory, possession, or trusteeship thereof, including, but not limited to, any court, grand jury, agency, department, or commission, or by either House of Congress or any committee thereof, to disclose any information or the sources of any information received or obtained while acting as a journalist or news medium. Defines the terms used in this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for first amendment protection of the free press.
